trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_000<tab>What an entrance! It was as if it appeared out of thin air! Now, can someone tell me exactly what in the world <var 1A 02 /var>it<var 1A 01 /var> is?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_010<tab>A <var 1A 02 /var>moogle<var 1A 01 /var>? Well, they bear no resemblance to the moogles in our productions. Our poor costumiers will have to start from scratch.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_020<tab>Oh, wonderful! A trip to the southern seas! Not that I will be disembarking, mind you.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_GOODLOOKINGMEMBER_000_040<tab>Finally leaving, are we? Well, this should be exciting! Though not for those lizards, perhaps...especially if it turns out their captain has gone the way of that other fellow.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_000<tab>Mayhap we require a ratter.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_010<tab>It took me five summers and ten auditions to earn my place on the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var>. That <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> is in for a surprise if it believes the principal will grant it a role on <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> stage.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_GARLEANSMEMBER_000_020<tab>I will admit, since arriving here in the south, there has not been a dull moment. Not that life back in Garlemald is dull, by any means. Only that you foreigners seem to embrace chaos where the sane man would seek to prevent it.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_PRETTYMEMBER_000_000<tab>Well is that not the sweetest thing you've ever seen! You <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> see him, can't you? It's not just me?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_PRETTYMEMBER_000_010<tab>These moogle creatures are utterly adorable! Do you think he'd mind if I stroked him?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_PRETTYMEMBER_000_020<tab>Given what the Empire did to the Bangaa's homeland...and the fact that we hail from <var 1A 02 /var>you-know-where<var 1A 01 /var>...do you think we should be worried?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_PRETTYMEMBER_000_040<tab>Yes, the Bangaa attacked you, stole the principal's precious heirloom, and held a knife to the throat of his daughter...but I don't see any reason why we shouldn't forgive them, do you?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_BEWITCHINGMEMBER_000_000<tab>How much fur do you think that creature's hide would yield? Just...hypothetically.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_BEWITCHINGMEMBER_000_010<tab>I had always wondered what moogles truly looked like. Something about the costumes we use here always seemed a little...odd.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_BEWITCHINGMEMBER_000_011<tab>The rabbit-like ears, the long limbs, the wispy singlets─
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_BEWITCHINGMEMBER_000_012<tab>If I did not know better, I would think our costumier had absolutely no idea what a moogle was...

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_BEWITCHINGMEMBER_000_020<tab>Experience has taught me that one ignores one's intuition at one's own peril. And something most definitely does not feel right about all of this.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_000<tab>What does a fur-clad potbelly have on a bronzed chest of rippling thew? I shall tell you─absolutely nothing!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_010<tab>Moogles, you say? Pah, I play a moogle in <var 1A 02 /var>The Zodiac Brave Story<var 1A 01 /var>, and I can tell you, <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> moogles are little like those portly vermin hovering before us.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_020<tab>While I do not condone the brutish tactics employed by our trio of unwanted guests, I feel it would be remiss of me not to commend them on their immaculate musculature.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_MUSCULARMEMBER_000_040<tab>Their ways may be barbaric, but their hearts seem true enough...as do their upper arms, their thighs, and their abdomens. Gods...those abdomens!
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_000<tab>Is that one of your faeries? No...it couldn't be. We're not over Eorzea. A kami, then! I had no idea they were so...rotund.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_010<tab>Hm? A “moogle”? Never heard of them. Are you quite certain it's not a kami? Or a yokai, perhaps?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_020<tab>What I wouldn't give to hear the Bangaa sing some of their kingdom's traditional songs...but mayhap now is not the time.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_PERFORMANCEMEMBER_000_040<tab>When all of this is over, I am going to ask the principal for leave to visit the Dalmascan mainland. If Dalmasca's ties to Ivalice are as strong as he claims, there may be much to gain from studying the kingdom's musical tradition.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_DANCINGMEMBER_000_000<tab>Wait, don't tell me! That's a─ It's aaa... A maggle! Yes, Eorzeans breed them for their meat! I read all about it in <var 1A 02 /var>Eat, Prey, Die<var 1A 01 /var>─the Culinarians' Guild publication, you know? They're meant to be delicious!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_DANCINGMEMBER_000_010<tab>Not a maggle, you say, but a moogle? <var 1A 02 /var>Eat, Prey, Die<var 1A 01 /var> says nothing of moogles. Are they as delicious as maggles?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_DANCINGMEMBER_000_020<tab>One, two, three... One, two, three... Naught like a well-choreographed routine to see you through testing times.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_DANCINGMEMBER_000_030<tab>One, two, three... One, two, three... Do you think the Bangaa have dances of their own? And do you think they would show me? No? You're probably right...

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_000<tab>Before Cid left, he handed me this queer contraption. Said it was an Allagan storage node, and that if I activated it, I'd hear the principal's voice as if he were standing right beside me. Would you care to try it?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_001<tab><gulp> An Allagan! They've woken from their slumber to punish us for the wanton misuse of their relics!

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_010<tab>Before Cid left, he handed me this queer contraption. Said it was an Allagan storage node, and that if I activated it, I'd hear the principal's voice as if he were standing right beside me. Would you care to try it?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_070<tab>Before Cid left, he handed me this queer contraption. Said it was an Allagan storage node, and that if I activated it, I'd hear the principal's voice as if he were standing right beside me. Would you care to─ Wait, shouldn't you be at the lighthouse?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_080<tab>Before Cid left, he handed me this queer contraption. Said it was an Allagan storage node, and that if I activated it, I'd hear the principal's voice as if he were standing right beside me. Would you care to try it?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_090<tab>Before Cid left, he handed me this queer contraption. Said it was an Allagan storage node, and that if I activated it, I'd hear the principal's voice as if he were standing right beside me. Would you care to try it?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_091<tab>Perhaps if Cid ever returns we can get him to record your voice. That's assuming <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> return, of course.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_100<tab>Before Cid left, he handed me this queer contraption. Said it was an Allagan storage node, and that if I activated it, I'd hear the principal's voice as if he were standing right beside me.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_ASSISRANTDIRECTOR_000_101<tab>I've been trying to convince him we could use a device like this in one of our productions, but Master Jenomis is having none of it. Says it can't be trusted. Would <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> care to try it?
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_WANDERINGWRITER_000_000<tab>Ah, a moogle. How quaint.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_WANDERINGWRITER_000_010<tab>Desert moogles, now? I suppose that would explain their current state of dishevelment.

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_WANDERINGWRITER_000_020<tab>My fellow thespians are wont to claim that the Ridorana Cataract is a one-way gate to the seventh hell. While I am not about to take their word for it, neither am I inclined to put their theory to the proof.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_WANDERINGWRITER_000_080<tab>These auracite relics are fascinating, are they not? If only we knew how to harness their power...without being possessed, I mean.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_WANDERINGWRITER_000_090<tab>Another bout with a soulless denizen of the deep? No rest for the righteous, eh?

TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_WANDERINGWRITER_000_091<tab>If things take a turn for the worse, do not hesitate to flee. There is no shame in yielding the battle if it eventually wins you the war.
TEXT_REGHINCOMPANYMENMBERS43_00483_WANDERINGWRITER_000_040<tab>They say a rose is a rose is a rose. So tell me, adventurer, is that a rose in your pocket, or are you simply here for small talk?
